pages.text: Marigold, known for its bright yellow flowers, is one of the most beneficial medicinal herbs, whose properties have been used by healers since ancient times. $(br2)It is not demanding, so it can be grown on wet tilled soil like any other crop. Seeds can be found in the grass.
A fully matured marigold flower, ready for harvest.

The marigold flower is the most important component that this noble plant gives to the herbalist. $(br2)In its pristine or ground form, these flowers are used in the creation of various healing ointments, potions, and poultices.

pages.title: Grinding
pages.text: Marigold flowers can be ground using a $(l:tools/mortar)mortar$(), turning them into a pleasantly scented powder. $(br2)This powder is used by herbalists and alchemists to create healing remedies, poultices, and other products related to healing.
